choose_method.description:
Select a method to configure {name} ({address}).
It is recommended to pair the device automatically.
Select the manual option only if you know what you are doing.

Before clicking "Pair", put the Nuki into pairing mode by pressing the button on your Nuki for 5 seconds, until the light is on continuously.

error.connection: Unable to connect to the server.
error.pairing:
Nuki is not in pairing mode.
Put the Nuki into pairing mode by pressing the button for 5 seconds and then try again.
